name: Oh So Lucky! Doctor: A Surgery Soap Opera
name_original: Oh So Lucky! Doctor: A Surgery Soap Opera
description:
'Welcome to Angel Valley Hospital! Can you survive the week?'

As a surgery intern you must survive the week whilst helping the many characters overcome their various problems. Oh so lucky! Doctor is a new type of soap opera game, which deals with many issues such as job loss, betrayal, friendship, shyness.

Game features

- Eight stories to follow, with multiple endings,
- Explore the 3D hospital environment,
- Buy gifts at the shops,
- Perform surgeries to earn money and experience,
- Play the slot machine and crane game at the arcades,
- Unlockable bonuses,
- Multiple endings,
- Easy to pick up and play, 

Purchase : $2.99

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1255160/Oh_So_Lucky_Doctor__A_Surgery_Soap_Op...

Note the download is a demo.
